languageKey.label: Debug: Choose debug settings. Debugging output can be directed to the controller's output (e.g. the frontend), to the Developer's Log (requires an extension like "devlog") or both.
None
To output
To Developer's Log
To both
Display Controller (cached)
Create a fully-cached Display Controller.
Display Controller (not cached)
Create a non-cached Display Controller. This should be chosen only if needed, for example in case of a search function.
